description: NVIDIA GPU Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where an unprivileged regular user can cause a NULL-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.

product.name: vGPU driver and Cloud gaming driver

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All versions prior to and including 13.8, 15.3, 16.1 and all versions prior to and including September 2023 release
